author: jonl
msg: Minor: Added documentation for key conversion classes.  Got rid of instanceof checks and casts regarding ILocalizable since only character and boolean conversions don't use locale right now (and booleans might someday).

author: jonl
msg: Major: Refactored converters so they can be constructed with a Locale parameter for convenience.  Also, fixed tests and simplified code according to developer list comments.  Much better now!

author: jonl
msg: Minor: Made locale private instead of protected in AbstractConverter
